
 EDUCATION
HUTECH UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY
OCT 2014 - OTC 2018
Major: Software technology

EXPERIENCE SUMMARY
- 4+ years of software experience.
- Strong experiences in Python, PHP, Java, Nodejs, Angular, Reactjs,
React native, WordPress, MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, No-SQL.
- Knowledgeable of E-commerce, Restaurant & Hotel, Design and
construction, Accounting.
- Experienced working in Software Development Company.
VO DINH NGHIA
Full Stack Developer
Aug 04, 1995
 Male
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam

WORK EXPERIENCE
FLOW TECHNOLOGY GROUP
SEP 2017 - PRESENT
Full Stack Developer
Flow is a company working in software development and technology solutions.
- Building mobile application serving peer to peer lending using React Native as front-end,
Django, Postgres, NodeJs, MongoDb as back-end.
- Building Education consultant company’s website, which is used to manage internal
resource, record student’s profile, internal report, using Django for back-end.
- Developing website for 3 Restaurant using React Js for front-end and Django for back-end.
- Developing an POS system using Odoo’s components for restaurant.
Y GROUP CO., LTD
FEB 2017 - JUL 2017
Web Developer
Y GROUP is a company working in the field of multimedia communications.
- Building website for company’s introduction using PHP and MySql.
- Building Internal messaging system using NodeJs and Mongo.
- Manage Social Account such as Facebook, Instagram, Zalo.
- Analize and integrate Api from Facebook, Instagram and Zalo.
A CONG JSC
MAR 2016 - FEB 2017
Web Developer
A CONG is a company working in the field of design and construction.
- Building website for company’s introduction using PHP and MySql.
- Building Internal real time messaging system using NodeJs, Socket.io and Mongo.
- Building Internal module for Human Resource.
- Management such as check in module using PHP and MySql.
FREELANCER
OTC 2014 - MAR 2016
Web Developer
- Web development with WordPress.
- Web development with PHP.
OBJECTIVE
Applying skills and experience at work
with the desire to bring technology
products with practical value to life.
